entityDefinitions.name: EducationOrganization

locallyDefinedProperties.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.
The full, legally accepted name of the institution.
A short name for the institution.
The public web site address (URL) for the education organization.

entityDefinitions.description: This entity represents any public or private institution, organization, or agency that provides instructional or support services to students or staff at any level.

entityDefinitions.name: GeneralStudentProgramAssociation

locallyDefinedProperties.description: The earliest date the student is involved with the program. Typically, this is the date the student becomes eligible for the program.
The month, day, and year on which the student exited the program or stopped receiving services.
Indicates whether the student received services during the summer session or between sessions.

entityDefinitions.description: This association base class represents the basic relationship between students and programs.

entityDefinitions.name: Program

locallyDefinedProperties.description: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a program by a school, school system, a state, or other agency or entity.
The formal name of the program of instruction, training, services, or benefits available through federal, state, or local agencies.

entityDefinitions.description: This entity represents any program designed to work in conjunction with, or as a supplement to, the main academic program. Programs may provide instruction, training, services, or benefits through federal, state, or local agencies. Programs may also include organized extracurricular activities for students.

entityDefinitions.name: Student

locallyDefinedProperties.description: The city the student was born in.
The month, day, and year on which an individual was born.
For students born outside of the U.S., the Province or jurisdiction in which an individual is born.
For students born outside of the U.S., the date the student entered the U.S.
A name given to an individual at birth, baptism, or during another naming ceremony, or through legal change.
An appendage, if any, used to denote an individual's generation in his family (e.g., Jr., Sr., III).
The name borne in common by members of a family.
The individual's maiden name.
A secondary name given to an individual at birth, baptism, or during another naming ceremony.
Indicator of whether the student was born with other siblings (i.e., twins, triplets, etc.)
A prefix used to denote the title, degree, position, or seniority of the individual.
A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.
A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

entityDefinitions.description: This entity represents an individual for whom instruction, services, and/or care are provided in an early childhood, elementary, or secondary educational program under the jurisdiction of a school, education agency or other institution or program. A student is a person who has been enrolled in a school or other educational institution.

entityDefinitions.name: ProgramTypeDescriptor
entityDefinitions.description: The formal name of the program of instruction, training, services, or benefits available through federal, state, or local agencies.

entityDefinitions.name: Descriptor

locallyDefinedProperties.description: A code or abbreviation that is used to refer to the descriptor.
The description of the descriptor.
A unique identifier used as Primary Key, not derived from business logic, when acting as Foreign Key, references the parent table.
The beginning date of the period when the descriptor is in effect. If omitted, the default is immediate effectiveness.
The end date of the period when the descriptor is in effect.

A globally unique namespace that identifies this descriptor set. Author is strongly encouraged to use the Universal Resource Identifier (http, ftp, file, etc.) for the source of the descriptor definition. Best practice is for this source to be the descriptor file itself, so that it can be machine-readable and be fetched in real-time, if necessary.
A unique identifier used as Primary Key, not derived from business logic, when acting as Foreign Key, references the parent table.
A shortened description for the descriptor.

entityDefinitions.description: This is the base entity for the descriptor pattern.

entityDefinitions.name: Session

locallyDefinedProperties.description: Month, day, and year of the first day of the session.
Month, day and year of the last day of the session.
The identifier for the calendar for the academic session.
The total number of instructional days in the school calendar.

entityDefinitions.description: A term in the school year, generally a unit of time into which courses are scheduled, instruction occurs and by which credits are awarded. Sessions may be interrupted by vacations or other events.

entityDefinitions.name: StudentProgramAssociation
entityDefinitions.description: This association represents the program(s) that a student participates in or is served by.

entityDefinitions.name: School
entityDefinitions.description: This entity represents an educational organization that includes staff and students who participate in classes and educational activity groups.

locallyDefinedProperties.description: The code for the current school year.
Key for School Year
The description for the SchoolYear type.

primaryEntityProperties.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

secondaryEntityProperties.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

primaryEntityProperties.description: The identifier assigned to a school.

secondaryEntityProperties.description: The identifier assigned to a school.
The identifier for the school year.

The formal name of the program of instruction, training, services, or benefits available through federal, state, or local agencies.

secondaryEntityProperties.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.
The formal name of the program of instruction, training, services, or benefits available through federal, state, or local agencies.

primaryEntityProperties.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

secondaryEntityProperties.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

primaryEntityProperties.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

secondaryEntityProperties.description: The identifier assigned to an education organization.

primaryEntityProperties.description: A unique identifier used as Primary Key, not derived from business logic, when acting as Foreign Key, references the parent table.
A unique identifier used as Primary Key, not derived from business logic, when acting as Foreign Key, references the parent table.

secondaryEntityProperties.description: A unique identifier used as Primary Key, not derived from business logic, when acting as Foreign Key, references the parent table.

primaryEntityProperties.description: The earliest date the student is involved with the program. Typically, this is the date the student becomes eligible for the program.
The identifier assigned to an education organization.
The identifier assigned to an education organization.
The formal name of the program of instruction, training, services, or benefits available through federal, state, or local agencies.
A unique alphanumeric code assigned to a student.

The identifier assigned to an education organization.
The identifier assigned to an education organization.
The formal name of the program of instruction, training, services, or benefits available through federal, state, or local agencies.
